title: Developing a novel magnetic organic polymer for selective extraction and determination of 16 macrolides in water and honey samples
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,8726-8734
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00496E, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Mengnan Liang, Na Li, Hao Zhang, Ling Ma, Ke Wang
A novel magnetic organic polymer Fe3O4@SiO2@Tb–PDAN was designed and synthesized, which was used as an adsorbent for magnetic solid-phase extraction (MSPE) for the determination of 16 MALs.
